snippet: Sarah Attar and Wodjan Ali Seraj Abdulrahim Shahrkhaniwill participate in the Olympics, which means that, for the first time, every participating country will have a female athlete.
abstract: Sarah Attar and Wodjan Ali Seraj Abdulrahim Shahrkhaniwill participate in the Olympics, which means that, for the first time, every participating country will have a female athlete.

headline.main: Two Female Athletes Will Compete for Saudi Arabia
